main.Query:
declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[tblUploadedFileDetails]'') AND type in (N''U'')) DROP TABLE [dbo].[tblUploadedFileDetails]
SET ANSI_NULLS ON SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON SET ANSI_PADDING ON
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[tblUploadedFileDetails]( [UploadID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [AccountNo] [varchar](20) NULL, [AuditLoan] [bit] NULL, [Included] [bit] NULL ) ON [PRIMARY]'
exec (@vchSQL)
